readme: # Anura Syntax A simple syntax theme based on colors from CotEditor's "Anura" theme. ## Installation To install Anura, search for `anura-syntax` on Atom's "Install" screen, or use APM: ``` $ apm install anura-syntax ``` ## Development To make changes to Anura: 1. Inside the repo directory, run `apm link -d`. This will symlink the repo folder to `~/.atom/dev/packages/`. 1. Open the directory in dev mode with `atom -d .`. In this mode, any changes you make will appear immediately. ## Publishing to APM ``` apm publish [ | major | minor | patch | build] git push --tags ```
